description:
In the final match of the preliminaries, Choji fights against Orochimaru`s minion Dosu. The preliminaries are finally over, and the Hokage reveals the third exam.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Shadow in Darkness: Danger Approaches Sasuke
Yami ni Ugomeku Kage Sasuke ni Semaru Kiki!
เงาร้ายในความมืด
闇にうごめく影 サスケに迫る危機!
